originalText.text:
I love this photo shop. I go with my children and it’s a great experience every time, pictures
come out so beautiful. The Photographer is great with children and very patient. The Price is the cherry on top. !
-Alexandria Glenn

come out so beautiful. The Photographer is great with children and very patient. The Price is the cherry on top. !

originalText.text: I needed graduation photo’s immediately. Called in and was able to make an appointment for that day! He had great communication with me on scheduling and pricing. Got there and he was very kind and personable. He even has caps and gowns..etc. He knew what he was doing and got my photos done in a timely manner while hyping me up loll. My photos were perfect and ready within a day of taking them. Great pricing and very accommodating!

originalText.text: My photos came out beautiful and I recommend this place to have your pictures taken at ❤️

text.text: My photos came out beautiful and I recommend this place to have your pictures taken at ❤️

originalText.text:
It was the perfect experience. I booked a session to have my daughters first birthday pictures taken. I explained my circumstances and quickly was set up for a session.
The day of I was running behind and called to see if I could push the session back and without hesitation proceded to accommodate even though he was booked for the day.
Upon arrival we were welcomed with a great smile and the energy of the shoot wasn’t tainted because of the tardiness. We went through different outfit and position changes and all throughout made jokes and made us feel comfortable. The space was a little ruff due to renovations but didn’t interfere with photos.
We then left and returned in a hour. The pool of pictures were ready and let me tell you we were taken back on how good the pictures were. It then took us another hour to choose between the pictures. You can tell they take pride in there work when he gets happy when it’s difficult for his clients to choose through his pictures.
I’ve been coming to this place since I was a kid and now I brought  my daughter to share the same experience. I’m glad everything was as good as when I was a kid.
I definitely recommend friends and family coming over here and plan on coming back soon for a different shoot.

originalText.text: My family has been coming here for 2 generations. Good photos, & a nice gentlemen. He only accepts cash & demands you pay first. Don't know if he'll do any re-takes if you don't like any of the first shots. His prices are way better than the competition. I don't think he's heard of the word negotiate before.
